lead_paragraph: Brian Vickers asked for and received permission from Hendrick Motorsports to look for a new ride, and Casey Mears was in line to replace him after informing the car owner Chip Ganassi that he would not return next year.
snippet: Brian Vickers asked for and received permission from Hendrick Motorsports to look for a new ride, and Casey Mears was in line to replace him after informing the car owner Chip Ganassi that he would not return next year.
